member.name: T:System.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Represents a resource manager that provides convenient access to culture-specific resources at run time.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceManager.#ctor(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ResourceManager class that looks up resources contained in files with the specified root name in the given assembly.
member.param: The root name of the resource file without its extension but including any fully qualified namespace name. For example, the root name for the resource file named MyApplication.MyResource.en-US.resources is MyApplication.MyResource.
The main assembly for the resources.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.Runtime.Native.ResourceUtility
member.summary: Helper class to access nanoFramework application managed resources.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Runtime.Native.ResourceUtility.GetObject(System.Resources.ResourceManager,System.Enum)
member.summary: Gets the value of a specified resource for the current system culture.
member.param: The that contains the specified resources.
The integer identifier for the specified resource.
member.returns: The value of the specified resource for the current system culture.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Runtime.Native.ResourceUtility.GetObject(System.Resources.ResourceManager,System.Enum,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value of a specified resource for the current system culture.
member.param: The that contains the specified resources.
The integer identifier for the specified resource.
The offset for retrieving the value.
The length of the value to retrieve.
member.returns: The value of the specified resource for the current system culture.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Runtime.Native.ResourceUtility.GetDelimitedStringResources(System.Resources.ResourceManager,System.Enum)
member.summary: Retrieves the string representations of the specified resources.
member.param: The that contains the specified resources.
An enumerated value that specifies the type of the resources for which you want to get the string representations.
member.returns: The string representations of the specified resources.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Runtime.Native.ResourceUtility.GetDelimitedStringResource(System.Resources.ResourceManager,System.Enum,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the string representation of a specified resource.
member.param: The that contains the specified resources.
An enumerated value that specifies the type of the resources for which you want to get the string representations.
The index number of the resource (in the resource manager's resource collection) for which you want to get the string representation.
member.returns: The string representations of the specified resource.
